products.title: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille honey yellow roman blind in yellow. Made to measure from 20.63 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft mustard yellow roman blind fuses a plush, luxuy feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!
 
 Product id: db-rom1139 fabric colour: honey yellow material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Chenille ASC Beige
products.metadescription: Perfect fit pleated blind chenille asc beige available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Chenille asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories.

products.title: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Curtain
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille honey yellow curtain in yellow. Made to measure from 29.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. These soft honey curtains fuse a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. Pair with cool modern greys or contrasting navy to act as a statement piece within your interior. This fabric will provide an elegant finish to rooms filled with wooden and natural tones. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk. 
 
We are so proud of the finish and quality, all their curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind.
